articles.title: This $20 Natural Deodorant Duo Keeps You Smelling Fresh — Even in Scorching Heat
articles.author: Annamarie Higley
articles.summary: Us Weekly has affiliate partnerships. Us Weekly receives compensation for this article as well as for purchases made when you click on a link and buy something below. Blu Atlas deodorant has nearly 170 reviews and 4.7 stars. The exfoliating bar soap has a higher star rating of 4.8.

articles.title: BREAKING: San Antonio firefighters race to put out blaze at northeast-side home
articles.summary: To stream KENS 5 on your phone, you need the KENS 5 app. It's free and available for Android and iOS devices. It is available on Google Play and Apple's Play Store. It costs about $0.99 per app.

articles.title: Taubmans taps Sunday Gravy
articles.author: Alisha Buaya
articles.summary: Taubmans has appointed Sunday Gravy to oversee its creative. Taubmans was founded by Australian signwriter George Henry Taubman in 1897 and is made locally. The creative agency was appointed as the independent creative and PR agency for toilet brand Sorbent last month.

articles.title: Syneriq opens new AI GCC in Hyd
articles.summary: Syneriq Global opened its new AI products, solutions, and consulting services global capability centre (GCC) in Hyderabad on Wednesday. The 40,000 sq ft facility, set up with an investment of 50 crore, aims to strengthen the company's position in the global digital sector.

articles.title: Scope3 launches agentic media platform for partners
articles.author: Matthew Leong
articles.summary: Scope3 is helping partners build and sell agentic media products with its new Scope3 Agentic Media Platform. Amazon DSP is the first DSP to integrate with the platform. Scope3 also announced the launch of Brand Standards. Brand Standards provides supply chain protection and custom brand definitions and control across all buying methods.

articles.title: Patronus AI's Judge-Image wants to keep AI honest — and Etsy is already using it
articles.summary: Patronus AI has developed a new AI evaluation technology for multimodal applications. Etsy is one of its customers. The company plans to expand into audio evaluation in the future. It uses Google's Gemini AI system instead of OpenAI's GPT-4V.

articles.title: The Light Phone 3 Wants to Free You From Modern Distractions
articles.author: Arol Wright
articles.summary: Light has just announced its latest "simple phone" entry, the Light Phone 3. The phone is designed to be a distraction-free device focused on essential communication and utility. The new model is set to release on March 27th and will be available for $599 for a limited time, before rising to $799.

articles.title: Walmart is selling a 'powerful' $407 electric pressure washer for $88, and shoppers say it's 'small but mighty'
articles.summary: The Sugift Electric Pressure Washer from Walmart is on sale for $88. It's 78% off the original $407 price tag. It packs up to 3,300psi and extends over 16 feet thanks to its pressure hose. It has five cleaning modes and comes with wheels, a handle and a designated hose holster.

articles.title: Uncle Funky's Daughter Introduces "Soul Bounce" Texture Defining Mousse: Elevate Your Natural Hair Game
articles.author: Uncle Funky's Daughter
articles.summary: Soul Bounce Texture Defining Mousse from Uncle Funky's Daughter redefines styling for natural hair. The mousse offers defined curls, enviable volume, and long-lasting bounce while nurturing and protecting your hair. Soul Bounce is available for purchase on the official website at www.unclefunkysdaughter.com and at select retailers nationwide.

articles.title: The 5 Best Self-Emptying Robot Vacuums For Effortless Cleaning
articles.author: Christine Colby
articles.summary: The iRobot Roomba s9+ is our top pick for self-emptying robot vacuums. It can hold a charge for 120 minutes, is conveniently shaped to reach corners, has extra strong suction power, and is easy to use. The Rooma j7+ has a lot in common with our top overall pick, but it's more suited for people with pets.

articles.title: Master Red Giant Trapcode in After Effects: Part 1
articles.author: Ai Journalist
articles.summary: The Maxon App serves as the central hub for managing your Maxon products, similar to the Adobe Creative Cloud app. The Trapcode installation involves a two-stage process. It is essential to shut down all instances of After Effects and Premiere Pro before starting the installation process.

articles.title: NEXGEL to Participate in the iAccess Alpha Virtual Best Ideas Spring Investment Conference on March 25-26th, 2025  Mar. 13, 2025 21:00
articles.summary: Adam Levy will present at iAccess Alpha Virtual Best Ideas Spring Investment Conference 2025 on March 25 and 26, 2025. NEXGEL is a leading provider of healthcare, beauty, and over-the-counter (OTC) products including ultra-gentle, high-water-content hydrogels.

articles.title: Amazon secretly slashed prices on spring cleaning essentials: Save up to 60%
articles.summary: It's almost springtime, which means it's time to clean the house. Amazon is offering some good deals on cleaning supplies. An iRobot Roomba vacuum cleaner is on sale for $130 (nearly 50% off) and a Yahoo editor-approved extendable electric scrubber for $30 (down from $50).

articles.title: Nowutalk AI Launches Voice-First Sales Agent for Shopify Stores, Empowering E-Commerce Owners with Real-Time Insights
articles.author: Nowutalkai
articles.summary: Nowutalk AI is the first voice-driven sales agent for Shopify stores. It works with a simple voice command and gathers real-time intelligence to help merchants make data-backed business decisions. It's live on Shopify and protected by a Patent. Nowutalk is testing the waters for an offering under Regulation Crowdfunding.

articles.title: Move over iPhone, here's a phone with a massive battery and built-in projector
articles.author: Patrick Hearn
articles.summary: The Tank 3 Pro is a rugged smartphone with a huge 23,800mAh battery and a built-in projector that can reach brightness levels of 100 lumens. It has 512GB of storage, 36 GB of RAM, a 200MP main camera and a 64MP night-vision camera. The phone comes with an IP68 rating for wet, dusty environments and it can survive drops from 1.5 meters. It's priced at $730.

articles.title: Redditor proves Linux desktop environments can run on your Google Pixel
articles.author: Chandraveer Mathur
articles.summary: Reddit user managed to run Linux on a Pixel 9 Pro XL using Google's new Terminal app. Current availability of the Terminal app on Pixel devices is limited to Pixel devices. Google hopes for a wider release on the Android 16 update, which should release shortly.

articles.title: Seasalt Cornwall dress that 'doesn't crease' drops from £70 to £40
articles.author: Lucy Addicott
articles.summary: Seasalt Cornwall's Tor View Maxi Length Printed Jersey Dress has been reduced in price from £69.95 to £39.95 in sizes 8 to 28. The dress has a red, white and blue floral print and can easily be packed into a suitcase or weekender bag without ironing at the other end.

articles.title: Former Golden State Warriors star Kevin Durant helped create a sandwich: Here's where to find it
articles.author: Jason Mastrodonato
articles.summary: 'The Steak' was launched last week and will remain in stores until June 30th. It will be on sale until March 13th, 2025.    - March 13, 2025 at 12:45 p.m. PDT - March 14th 2025 at 1:45 pm PDT

articles.title: Sky Glass gen 2 review: A step up in sound and picture quality
articles.author: Alex Lee
articles.summary: Sky Glass gen 2 is lighter than the first-generation model, but it's still heavy. The new stand has a much better design and is easier to install. Sky is set to launch the Sky Glass air later this year, a lighter version without the integrated soundbar. It runs on the newly rebranded Sky OS (previously Entertainment OS), powered by an upgraded processor and SoC.

articles.title: Grab the Brand-New 85-Inch TCL QM6K for $500 Off
articles.author: Game Rant
articles.summary: TCL pre-ordered the 2025 QM6K series from TCL and got a free gift with pre-orders.   Â   i.e. a free phone. For more information, visit tcl.com/qm6k-series.

articles.title: Trading in GN Store Nord shares by board members, executives and associated persons
articles.summary: Lise Skaarup Mortensen bought 4,000 shares of GN Store Nord at DKK 118.77 per share on March 12th. Lise is a member of the Board of Directors. GN facilitates communication between people through intelligent hearing, audio, video, and gaming technology.

articles.title: Google Play Games is coming to even more Windows devices — and with new PC games, too
articles.author: Simon Batt
articles.summary: Google is expanding the Google Play Games app to more devices, including AMD laptops and desktops. Popular PC games like "DREDGE," "TABS Mobile" and "Disco Elysium" are getting Android ports. Google is giving game developers access to the Vulkan API and the Android Dynamic Performance Framework.

articles.title: Minimalist Light Phone III launches March 27
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Light will launch its newest model, the Light Phone III, on March 27. This version of the device offers a simple black-and-white display and necessary features like support for calls, texts, navigation, alarms, hotspots. It is designed to help consumers disconnect from smartphone distractions and social media.

articles.title: Skyline Celebrates 45 Years of Exhibit Innovation
articles.author: Skyline
articles.summary: It's been 45 years since Skyline Exhibits opened in 1980. Skyline was included on the Inc. 500 list of fastest-growing private companies in 1987 and 1988. The company offers the highest quality exhibits, expert services, and comprehensive exhibit program management. New CEO Bobbie Caldwell-Hatch was appointed in late 2024.

articles.title: MTN Nigeria, Lagos State Government Launch 'MyLagosApp'To Revolutionise Urban Living In Lagos
articles.author: Daily Independent
articles.summary: MTN Nigeria in partnership with the Lagos State Government has launched 'MyLagosApp'. The app is a comprehensive hub for city dwellers and visitors. It offers real-time updates on events, entertainment, hospitality, transport services and government-related payments. The launch event was held in Lagos on Tuesday.

articles.title: Airtel Activates AI-Powered Spam Alert Service for Customers
articles.author: Dipo Olowookere
articles.summary: Airtel Africa Plc has introduced a ground-breaking artificial intelligence (AI)-powered Spam Alert Service. It gives real-time alerts for suspected spam SMS messages and malicious weblinks sent to Airtel smartphones and feature phones. It filters all SMS through a proprietary dual-layer protection processing over 1.5 billion messages in 2 milliseconds. It is available to all subscribers of the GSM provider at no cost. It will be rolled out across other African countries in coming months.

articles.title: Meghan Trainor Helps Consumers Reimagine and 'Re-Train' Their Laundry Routine
articles.author: Brandpoint
articles.summary: Meghan Trainor is passionate about making life simpler. She recommends ARM & HAMMER POWER SHEETS, which makes doing laundry easier and eliminates plastic bottle waste. Meghan is part of the latest ARM &HAMMER campaign, reimagining her song "Been Like This."

articles.title: Verano Targets Industry's Fastest-Growing Categories with Expansion of Savvy™ and (the) Essence™ Product Portfolios in Leading Cannabis Markets  Mar. 13, 2025 18:00
articles.summary: Verano Holdings Corp. (Cboe CA: VRNO) (OTCQX:VRNOF) is a leading multi-state cannabis company. Verano has launched a wave of new product innovation across the fastest-growing categories in key markets. The products include Extra Savvy 2-gram vape cartridges, Savvy 100 Proof diamond-infused barrel-style pre-rolls and Savvy Strut 2-gauge all-in-one vapes.

articles.title: The best spin scrubbers of 2025, tested and reviewed
articles.summary: Electric spin scrubbers have the power to turn your cleaning right around. They are versatile and easy to use and maintain, with run times of up to 100 minutes for uninterrupted cleaning. The Cosabella is an extendable, handheld and mini spin scrubber that made it to the top of the list.

articles.title: Seagate Ultra-Compact SSD review: A tiny but massive storage for folk on-the-go
articles.author: Tom Hutchison
articles.summary: The Seagate Ultra-Compact SSD drive from Seagate costs £170. It's 7cm long by 2cm wide and comes with a removable rubber protective case and fabric hoop to stick on a keychain. It has a rapid transfer speed of up to 1,000MB-per-second and a three-metre drop resistance, IP54 dust and water resistance. There's a six-month complimentary trial of Dropbox Backup and Mylio Photos+.

articles.title: China New Growth: Tech-powered personalization shapes future of consumption
articles.author: Xinhua
articles.summary: Xinhua presents three stories that explore China's "new consumption trends" and their role in driving sustained growth. The second instalment explores how mass-market products have pivoted to niche audiences and transformed into stylish brands. Small-scale manufacturers have reinvented themselves as pioneering brands, driving innovation.

articles.title: New Balance's TOKYO DESIGN STUDIO SS25 Is Made for Movement
articles.summary: The TOKYO DESIGN STUDIO New Balance SS25 Uni-ssentials collection will be released in select New Balance Japan stores and the New Balance website on Friday, March 14. The collection offers essentials in two main hues of black and translucent yellow, sprinkled with neutral beige pieces.

articles.title: Virgin Media offering FREE iPad to customers, but you'll need to be quick
articles.author: Joshua Boyles
articles.summary: Virgin Media is offering a free iPad to select customers. The device is the 9th Gen iPad. It has a 10.2-inch screen, an A13 Bionic processor, and a Touch ID fingerprint sensor. It's not the latest model, but it's a solid tablet that's perfect for watching films on the go, sending emails, and browsing the internet. The offer is only available when subscribing to the company's premium TV and broadband package.

articles.title: Sponsored Content: Healthy Smiles with Thrive Pet Healthcare

articles.author: Danielle Halibey
articles.summary: Jasper Plum and Blush Pink is a new colorway for Dyson's best-selling hair tools. It's available through the Mother's Day 2025 season. The range includes the Airwrap i.d. Multi-Styler and Dryer for both Straight+Wavy and Curly+Coily Hair, the new Supersonic r Hair Dryer and the Airstrait Straightener. The tools are priced from $500 to $600.

articles.title: This Ionic Hair Dryer ‘Works the Exact Same Way' as a $430 Dyson Model, According to Shoppers — and It's $70
articles.author: Clint Davis
articles.summary: The Ipstea Ionic Hair Dryer is 71% off for Amazon Prime members. It's similar to the $430 Dyson Supersonic, but it's an ionic hair dryer instead of a traditional ceramic model. More than 300 shoppers have bought one in the past month and the reviews are overwhelmingly positive.

articles.title: How to Use Sex Toys, According to a Sex-Toy Expert 2025
articles.author: Amanda Chatel
articles.summary: Learn how to use sex toys based on the most common types on the market. We-Vibe Tango X has a long-lasting battery, an angled tip that applies pinpointed pressure to the clit, and eight intensities that are stronger than you'd expect.

articles.title: Route to Renaissance
articles.author: Chaitanya K Prasad
articles.summary: In 2025, conversational AI has revolutionised how brands communicate with their audiences. It has transformed what were once transactional interactions into rich, personalised dialogues. Voice AI takes this a step further, adding a sensory layer to brand interactions. By 2026, "ethical AI" certifications will become as crucial to branding as today's sustainability certifications.

articles.summary: Elon Musk's offering is inferior to that of Elon Musk's competitor.    Click here to read the full news.  For confidential support call the Samaritans on 08457 909090 or visit a local Samaritans branch, see here for details.

articles.title: The £14 hair thickening and growth shampoo so effective, over 7,300 shoppers gave it five stars
articles.author: Shawna Healey
articles.summary: Beauty buffs with longer, thicker and more lustrous hair are crediting their newfound locks with the Growth Shampoo. For best results, the brand recommends leaving the shampoo on your scalp for a few minutes to allow the formula to penetrate deeply. One shopper 'noticed a difference' to their hair after just one application of the growth shampoo.

articles.title: Sigma BF Review: Ideal Camera for Minimalists
articles.author: archyde
articles.summary: Sigma's new camera, the BF, has a minimalist design and high-end point-and-shoot capabilities. It's well-suited for casual photography, but not for professional photographers. Reviewer finds it hard to use the camera with one hand, and the lack of a second strap link is frustrating for some.

articles.title: Marks and Spencer fans 'love everything about' new £35 top that's 'easily dressed up'
articles.author: Emily Chaplin
articles.summary: The Pure Cotton Textured V-Neck Ruffle blouse is flying off the shelves at M&S. It's priced at £35 and has a floaty fit with a V-neckline and feminine self-tie detailing. Next is selling a Long Sleeve Boho Mesh Blouse for £40 and New Look's White Frill Trim Tie Neck Blouse is £29.99.

articles.title: ‘PowerWash Simulator 2' Has Just Been Announced, and I Guess That's the Little Bit of Free Time I Had Left Gone
articles.author: Dwayne Jenkins
articles.summary: PowerWash Simulator 2 is coming out later this year. It's a sequel to the original game, which was reviewed by another outlet. FuturLab has added new features to the game, such as split-screen co-op and shared online campaign progression.

articles.title: Technology Is Creating a More Seamless Experience, So Why Is Consumer Confidence Waning?
articles.author: Alexandra Pastore
articles.summary: Coveo's fifth annual commerce relevance report put a spotlight on gen AI. According to the report, 90 percent of consumers believe that online shopping experiences should match or surpass in-store experiences. The demand for convenience, confidence and clarity in online shopping is driving consumer adoption of gen AI, but it needs to be applied correctly.

articles.title: National K9 Veterans Day
articles.author: Trent Gilbreath
articles.summary: Amazon's new releases page curates the hottest products to go on sale in the last seven days. It's also a place to buy new products that Amazon has curated for you to buy on the market place.    for more information, visit Amazon.com/news.

articles.title: These Are All The Things You Thought Elon Musk Was Going To Do To Bump The Stock Price
articles.summary: Elon Musk needs to rebrand Tesla to something less toxic than the current brand name. He needs to fight Zuck in the Octagon. All government vehicles will be electric within a year. Telsa will be making 6 new factories to support the sudden spike in demand. DOD will need 20,000 electric tanks.

articles.title: Founders: Forget about AGI and focus on building AI that works
articles.author: Taylor Soper
articles.summary: There's debate about when artificial intelligence, or AGI, will come to fruition. Tim Porter, managing director at Seattle-based Madrona, is more interested in vertical AI, or AI systems built for specific industries or use cases. Daryn Nakhuda, a longtime Seattle tech leader who currently leads engineering at self-driving truck startup Waabi, advises startups to focus on value creation.

articles.title: A wine expert reveals the five wines they'll definitely be buying from Aldi this spring, including a £9 rosé that's a great swap for Whispering Angel
articles.author: SCARLETT DARGAN
articles.summary: Aldi has a new spring wine range. Sam Caporn recommends Unearthed Thracian Valley Pinot Noir Rosé, £8.99, and Contevedo Cava Brut, £5.79. Sam also recommends Gavi, Costières de Nîmes Blanc and Macedonian Kratosija, £6.99.

articles.title: Amazon Kindle Paperwhite (2024) review: The best Kindle for most people
articles.author: Alan Martin
articles.summary: The Kindle Paperwhite (2024) is Amazon's new waterproof e-book reader. It's £30 more expensive than the previous model, but it's still a great device. It has a 16% larger screen than the entry-level Kindle and an e-ink display that sits flush with the bezels. There are no page-turning buttons on the Paperwhite, but there is an adjustable warm light.

articles.summary: Amazon's new releases page curates the hottest products to go on sale in the last seven days. It's also a place to buy new products that Amazon has curated for you to buy on the market place.    for more information, visit Amazon.com/news.

articles.title: Roman shoppers 'feel like a Queen' in 'floaty' £60 maxi dress 'perfect for weddings'
articles.author: Emily Sleight
articles.summary: Roman shoppers are on the hunt for a flattering and versatile maxi dress for wedding season. The Blue Sleeveless Abstract Print Maxi Dress is available in sizes 10, 12, 14, 16, 18, 18 and 20. It is also available in a pink and orange combination for a slightly more expensive £65. Next is selling a unique Blue Navy 3D Floral Print Textured V-Neck Dress for £96.

articles.summary: The live service market doesn't let players go. Astrobot is an example of a game that allows you to explore other genres.    The game is great, but it doesn't give you the freedom to explore the other games on PS5.

articles.title: YETI's mysterious new color has fans buzzing: Here's how to get it first
articles.author: Mikhayla Dunaj
articles.summary: The new YETI color is coming tomorrow, Friday, March 14th. Account holders will get early access to orders and receive updates and links about the drop. YETi account holders also get free shipping and returns and first dibs on deals.

articles.title: Cyprus-based Skich launches alternative gaming store for iPhone users
articles.author: Cyprus Mail
articles.summary: Skich has launched Skich Store, an alternative app marketplace designed to enhance game discovery and distribution for mobile gamers. It is specifically designed to cater to players' tastes.       - Skich.  - Game discovery has remained a major challenge for players and developers alike.

articles.title: Amazon's 'genius' door airer that 'saves floor space' now £14
articles.author: Amber O'Connor Money
articles.summary: Amazon has reduced the price of OHS Over Door Clothes Airer from £19.99 to £13.99. Debenhams also has a similar airer for £21.99, Dunelm offers an Over the Door Concertina Air for £14, and Asda's George has a Kleeneze Space Saving Overdoor Cl clothes Airers for £24.99 and Argos has discounted its Argos Home 11m over the door Clothes Indoor Air to £22.40.

Debenhams also has a similar airer for £21.99, Dunelm offers an Over the Door Concertina Air for £14, and Asda's George has a Kleeneze Space Saving Overdoor Cl clothes Airers for £24.99 and Argos has discounted its Argos Home 11m over the door Clothes Indoor Air to £22.40.

Dunelm offers an Over the Door Concertina airer for £14, and Asda's George has a Kleeneze Space Saving Overdoor Cl clothes Airers for £24.

articles.title: You can now order a PS5 to your doorstep in 30 mins as CEX joins Just Eat
articles.author: Lloyd Coombes
articles.summary: CEX is joining Just Eat in a surprising move announced today. Just Eat users can order popular CEX products and have them delivered right to their door. CEX offers a 5-year warranty and is covered by CeX's warranty. The news follows a recent rollout of a PS5 leasing scheme from PlayStation.

articles.title: Baker Tilly Case Study: Process Mapping for Successful Multiplatform Feature Innovation
articles.summary: The client manufactures lighting solutions across industries. Baker Tilly's digital solutions team was asked to help develop a new customer-facing web portal. This portal aims to reduce call volume in customer support and increase customer satisfaction and effectiveness. The client sells theatre equipment to dealers, distributors and sales reps. They need to execute complex, often years-long collaborations on designing, installing and supporting their products and equipment.

articles.title: Skich launches an alternative app store on iOS in the EU
articles.author: Techcrunch
articles.summary: Skich, a Tinder-like app for discovering mobile games, announced Thursday the launch of a new marketplace. Skich Store will be available for iOS users in the European Union. The company plans to begin adding games to the store soon.  .

articles.title: Typeface Introduces the New AI-Native Content Lifecycle, Powered by Deeply Specialized Marketing Agents and Dynamic Brand Hub
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Typeface announced the launch of a new Marketing AI Platform. It will reimagine the entire content lifecycle with a suite of specialized marketing agents and a dynamic brand system of intelligence powered by Brand Hub. It is a true collaboration space where marketers and AI come together.

articles.title: 2025 Acura ADX Won Me Over With Affordable, Honest, And User-Friendly Luxury
articles.summary: The ADX is Acura's new subcompact SUV that starts at $36,350 and goes for $46,890. It's less of an Integra SUV and more of an elevated HR-V. It has a turbocharged 1.5-liter inline-4 with VTEC that produces 190 horsepower and 179 pound-feet of torque. The ADX's turbo four produces its max horsepower at 6,000 rpm but redline is just 500 rpm beyond that. The optional all-wheel drive system isn't necessary in the ADX.

articles.title: Men's Grooming Brand Duke Cannon Makes First 'UN-NIL' Deal with Iowa State Mascot
articles.author: T.L. Stanley
articles.summary: Duke Cannon will supply Cy the Cardinal with its range of shampoos, deodorants, body washes, and other products for the NCAA's Final Four. The company can't use the name, image, or likeness of its new partner, so it's calling it the 'first-ever UN-NIL deal'. The brand will use a new creative agency Quality Meats.

articles.title: Resulticks Unveils Genie: AI-Powered Agent For Marketers Cuts Workload by 40%, Drives Real-Time Audience Engagement
articles.author: Joplin Globe
articles.summary: Genie is an advanced AI-powered agent designed to help teams turn insights into action, measure attribution and drive better customer experiences. Resulticks is a global leader in real-time audience engagement and today announced the launch of Genie, a new tool for businesses.

articles.title: Startek Wins Bronze Stevie® for Excellence in Customer Experience
articles.author: Devdiscourse News Desk
articles.summary: Startek has been awarded a Bronze Stevie Award at the 2025 Stevie Awards for Sales & Customer Service. Startek's recognition represents its commitment to harnessing technology for customer engagement and optimizing performance through AI and digital solutions. By utilizing real-time insights and automation, Startek drives hyper-personalized interactions at scale.

articles.title: GLO network upgrade: A masterstroke in Information Technology service delivery
articles.author: Cyriacus Nnaji Strictly
articles.summary: Globacom network upgrade was a masterstroke in Information Technology service delivery. Globacom has become synonymous with innovation in recent years. It is the practical implementation of ideas that result in the introduction of new goods or services or improvement in offering of goods and services.

articles.title: Dreame Unveils Revolutionary Robotic Pool Cleaners at Exclusive New York Event
articles.author: Dreame
articles.summary: Dreame Technology hosted an exclusive editor and influencer event at The Peninsula Hotel NYC to celebrate the launch of its next-generation robotic pool cleaners. The event offered attendees a first look at Dreame's advanced pool-cleaning technology, designed to redefine effortless, automated pool maintenance.

articles.title: Cizzle Brands Corporation Schedules Second Fiscal Quarter 2025 Financial Results Webcast for Thursday, March 27, 2025 at 4:30 PM ET
articles.author: Business Wire
articles.summary: Cizzle Brands Corporation will release financial results for the second quarter of its fiscal 2025 year ended January 31, 2025 ('FQ2 2025') after market close on Monday, March 17, 2025. Cizzle Brands will conduct a webcast to discuss these results on the Thursday of the following week.

articles.title: Get a HUGE $115 discount on the 'super powerful' Dyson cordless and handheld vacuum combo: 'Best I have ever owned... amazing suction!'
articles.author: TANYA SHARMA
articles.summary: Dyson V15 Detect Cordless Vacuum is on sale for $650. Enter WELCOME15 at checkout and you'll get an additional $15 off your total. It's a cordless vacuum cleaner with multiple attachments and a handy storage dock. It has a five-star rating from thousands of satisfied customers.

articles.summary: Nationwide, Lloyds and Santander customers alerted to cash offer and told they will be 'quids in' NatWest has launched the new offer but warned it could be withdrawn at any time. New customers need to follow certain conditions to secure the payments. The account comes with a monthly £2 charge.

articles.author: JOIN THE CONVERSATION
articles.summary: NEXE Innovations Inc. (TSX.V: NEXE) (Frankfurt: NX5) (OTC: NexNF) is pleased to announce the completion of its fifth delivery to EKOCUPS, a well-established company based in the U.S. that sells its coffee products online and is a high-volume seller through Amazon. articles.title: Trading in GN Store Nord shares by board members, executives and associated persons
articles.summary: GN Store Nord has received notification pursuant to article 19 of regulation (EU) no. 596/2014 of the below transactions related to shares in GN Store Nord made by persons discharging managerial responsibilities in the company and/or people closely associated with them. GN facilitates communication between people through intelligent hearing, audio, video, and gaming technology. Founded in 1869, the GN Group employs 7,000 people and is listed on Nasdaq Copenhagen (GN.CO).
